nodes.text: The unidentified heavy blaster rifle model existed in the galaxy from the Rise of the Empire era until the New Republic era.

The heavy blaster rifle appeared in the video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its expansion pack Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds: Clone Campaigns. The weapon was used by the Armored Stormtroopers, Rebel troopers, Royal Naboo troopers, Trade Federation droids and Clone troopers.
